rose by hsume2

A slick Ruby DSL for reporting.

Install

$ gem install rose

Usage

Rose.make(:worlds) do
  rows do
    column(:hello => "Hello")
    column(:world)
  end
end

class World < Struct.new(:hello, :world)
end

Rose(:worlds).bloom([World.new("Say", "what?")]).to_s

+---------------+
| Hello | world |
+---------------+
| Say   | what? |
+---------------+
